_header: Jews hateth our Lady much and Her sweet Son also
_description: A miracle of Our Lady, ‘Toledo’, in the South English Legendary: twelve couplets

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
GIewes hateþ oure lady muche & hire suete sone
                    alsoþat is sene in many stede bi þat þe shrewes haue
                    do…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Ȝeue vs grace þat we mote suiche mylte here
                    winneÞat we mot to þe ioye come þat þou wonest
                    inne
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Gewes hatyeþ oure Leuedy moche & here swete sone al
                    soÞat is y sene in many dede þat þe scherewen haueþ i
                    do…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…ȝeue vs grace þat we mote such milce here
                    wynneÞat we mote to þe ioye come þat þu art
                    ynne

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Þe Jewes hate mekil our lady & hir swete sone alsoAls we
                    be ensample fynde & fayn wold do hym wo…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Gife vs grace to mende our life & clense vs of our
                    synÞat we may come vn to þat blisse þer þu lady art in
                    Amen

CamCCC14.First Lines:
Gywes hatieþ oure leuedy muche & hure swete sone
                    alsoÞat is isene ni mony dede þat þe ssrewene habbeþ
                    ido…
CamCCC14.Last Lines:
…ȝif us grace þat we mote such milce (?) here
                    wynneÞat we mote to þe ioie come þat þou ert
                    Inne
CamCCC14.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 237.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Þe gyewes hatyeþ oure lady and hure swete sone
                    alsoÞat is ysene in many dede þat þe schrewes habbeþ
                    ydo…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Ȝif vs grace þat we mote of þe such mylce
                    wynneÞat we mote to þe ioye come þat þi sone and
                    þou beoþ ynne

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
Gywes hatyeþ oure lady muche & hure swete sone
                    alsoþat is y sene in many dede þat þe ssrewen havyþ i
                    do
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…ȝif vs grace þat we mote suche milte here
                    wynneþat we mote to þe Ioye come þat þou arte
                    Inne

BLCottCleoDIX.First Lines:
[G]iwes hatieþ oure leuedi moche & hire swete sone
                    alsoÞat is isene in mani dede þat þe schrewen habbeþ
                    ido…
BLCottCleoDIX.Last Lines:
…Ȝeue ous grace þat we mot soche milch here a
                    winneÞat we mote to þe ioie come þer as þu art inne
                    amen
BLCottCleoDIX.Note:
Folio number reflects the most recent foliation. Space left for enlarged
                    ‘G’, which was left blank.

BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Ȝif us grace þat we mote such milce here wynneþat we mote to þe ioie come þat þou ert Inne

BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Ȝeue ous grace þat we mote such milce her iwynneÞat we mote to þe ioye come þat þu ert inne
